mapper.select: select a.drug_name,sum(a.plantobuy_number) insum from t_storge a group by(drug_name)
select a.outsum,b.drug_name from (select a.drug_id,sum(a.sold_num) outsum from t_sold a group by(drug_id)) a,t_drug b where a.drug_id=b.drug_id
select a.outsum*bPrice price,b.drug_name from (select a.drug_id,a.BIR_PRICE bPrice,sum(a.sold_num) outsum from t_sold a group by drug_id,BIR_PRICE) a,t_drug b where a.drug_id=b.drug_id
